projects.title: Home Lab
projects.shortDesc: Due to COVID and a work from home environment for my family, I took the initiative to create a robust, scalable network and home lab. The setup is complete with a NAS, media server, game host server, and advanced home automation controls.

projects.title: LabLink
projects.shortDesc: Creating a universal method for lab students to request help from a teaching assistant (TA). Then, provide a simple way for the teaching assistant to manage the queue of users in real time.

projects.title: The Bridge
projects.shortDesc: Visualize songs in real time on a beautifully crafted model bridge.

projects.title: ModMail Bot
projects.shortDesc: I love making utility focused Discord bots that help server administrators and staff do their job efficiently, quickly, and organized. This system has helped me and countless staff members manage support requests with ease all within Discord.

projects.title: VoxArt
projects.shortDesc: Utilizing hand movements to control digital audio effects. Giving artistic expression into the hands of the vocalist as a conductor is to an orchestra emphasizing vocals with hand movements. With simple, easy to use off the shelf hardware, alter audio effect parameters using a closed loop control system.

projects.title: Broadcast
projects.shortDesc: I have experience with broadcast signal flows in remote and in-person production environments. I mainly have gathered my experience through esports and HOW shows. I especially enjoy camera operating, lighting and technical directing.
